author: Staff Reporter
text:
V. Kalyani (42) of Keela Street, Maruthur was beheaded at Kaliyavur under Murappanadu police limits on Thursday. The incident occurred near a brick kiln. Property dispute between Kalyani and his relative A. Kani alias Arumukakani (25) is said to be the reason behind the murder.

Quarrels erupted as the enmity grew and Arumukakani severed Kalyani’s head, sources said. Subsequently, the severed head was thrown into a Pillaiyar temple at Kaliyavur. Superintendent of Police Ashwin M. Kotnis inspected the spot and held inquiries with people on the spot. He said the accused Kani was arrested. Based on a complaint lodged by C. Kalyani alias Bala (37), relative of deceased, Murappanadu police have filed a case.
title: Man beheaded
